ISSUE.TITLE: docs.orchardcore.net is extremely slow
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Loading pages on docs.orchardcore.net takes about 2 minutes per page, unless the page has been visited recently. Navigating to the workflows documentation: ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/10190259/97716634-3ddb4c80-1a9a-11eb-8c10-64da07ceb3b5.png)

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Comment git_authors and custom theme in docs Related to #7445
